name: The Hunger Games: Propaganda Film
detailed_description: This propaganda film, narrated by President Snow describes the peace that rose from the creation of The Hunger Games.
about_the_game: This propaganda film, narrated by President Snow describes the peace that rose from the creation of The Hunger Games.
